Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, east of the goblin shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Shrine of Maglubiyet is dedicated to the goblin diety. Maglubiyet enjoys wars and conflicts, believing that they bring out the best traits in all goblins and hobgoblins. Being of a similar philosophy to Gruumsh, both factions are usually fighting to see which is more superior and more worthy of their respective god's praise.
